verses.name: Jeremiah 27:1
verses.text: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah came this word unto Jeremiah from the Lord, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 27:2
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord to me; Make thee bonds and yokes, and put them upon thy neck,

verses.name: Jeremiah 27:3
verses.text: And send them to the king of Edom, and to the king of Moab, and to the king of the Ammonites, and to the king of Tyrus, and to the king of Zidon, by the hand of the messengers which come to Jerusalem unto Zedekiah king of Judah;
